messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Desk
messages.body: Goal is to test a prototype shielding system, because we got stuck in a zone full of space junk. Good luck everybody!

messages.author: Captain's Desk
messages.body: Reminder: suit sensors to max, and don't lose your goddamn minds! This isn't Lord of The Flies!

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: All crew are free to open fire on Mateo Keppel. First one to kill him and bring me his corpse and all his posessions becomes HoP or whatever dream job you want.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nuclear Self Destruct Codes Requested

The codes for the on-station nuclear self-destruct have been requested by Mateo Keppel. Confirmation or denial of this request will be sent shortly.
